thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au | 6 of 79
thread.title: Nathan

author: Nathan
title: Nathan
text: After looking for tickets for the Book of Mormon for an upcoming trip to Melbourne, tickets for the show were all sold out for the dates we were there. Visited the resale site a few times to see if there were other options and found a couple of tickets, second row for only $30 more than ticketed. There were other options for the Friday and Saturday night which were a fair bit more expensive but we had a great experience with it and will definitely be looking at it again if we have an impromptu trip in future.
